readme.txt.content: Play this game by pasting the script in http://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html

script.txt.content:

author Jack Lance


run_rules_on_level_start

=======
LEGEND
=======
(If you are reading this, sorry. I just used the "Level editor" because I didn't want to try and find suitable symbols for everything.)

1 = Background1
3 = Wall
4 = Player and Background1 and PlayerRight
g = Player and Background1 and PlayerLeft
h = Player and Background1 and PlayerUp
j = Player and Background1 and PlayerDown
k = Player and Background1

5 = PlayerTail and RightMarker and PlayerRight and Background1
6 = PlayerTail and LeftMarker and PlayerLeft and Background1
7 = PlayerTail and UpMarker and PlayerUp and Background1
8 = PlayerTail and DownMarker and PlayerDown and Background1

9 = PlayerBody and RightMarker and Background1
0 = PlayerBody and LeftMarker and Background1
q = PlayerBody and UpMarker and Background1
w = PlayerBody and DownMarker and Background1

e = Crate1 and Crateup and Background1
r = Crate1 and Crateright and Background1
t = Crate1 and Crateup and Crateright and Background1
y = Crate2 and Crateup and Background1 and Target
u = Crate2 and Crateright and Background1 and Target 
i = Crate2 and Crateup and Crateright and Background1 and Target




a = Crate1 and Background1
s = Crate2 and Target and Background1
d = Target and Background1
f = Apple and Background1

Marker = UpMarker or LeftMarker or RightMarker or DownMarker
Body = PlayerUp or PlayerDown or PlayerLeft or PlayerRight
PlayerPart = Player or PlayerBody or PlayerTail
Crate = Crate1 or Crate2
Background = Background1
CrateBody=CrateUp or CrateDown or CrateLeft or CrateRight
cant=cantup or cantdown or cantleft or cantright

=======
SOUNDS
=======

Undo 50721302
Restart 31950301
Player MOVE 71013707
SFX0 88208701  (Eat apple)
endlevel 90267708  (Win, but where to bind it?)
SFX2 23251107
SFX3 27612707

================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================
act
cantleft
cantright
cantup
cantdown
Marker
Background
Target
Player, PlayerBody, PlayerTail, Wall, Crate, Apple
PlayerLeft, Crateleft
PlayerRight, Crateright
PlayerUp, Crateup
PlayerDown, cratedown
GhostTarget






======
RULES
======
[action player act] -> win
[action player] -> [player act]

[cant]->[]
[ > Player | Crate ] -> [ > Player | > Crate ]
left [ > Player | Apple | ] -> [ PlayerBody Leftmarker | Player | SFX0]
right [ > Player | Apple | ] -> [ PlayerBody Rightmarker | Player | SFX0 ]
up [ > Player | Apple | ] -> [ PlayerBody Upmarker | Player | SFX0 ]
down [ > Player | Apple | ] -> [ PlayerBody Downmarker | Player | SFX0 ]



[ left Player ] -> [ left Player Leftmarker ]
[ right Player ] -> [ right Player Rightmarker ]
[ up Player ] -> [ up Player Upmarker ]
[ down Player ] -> [ down Player Downmarker ]


left [crate|playerpart] -> [crate cantleft| playerpart]
left [crate|wall] -> [crate cantleft|wall]
left [crate|apple] -> [crate cantleft |apple]
right [crate|playerpart] -> [crate cantright| playerpart]
right [crate|wall] -> [crate cantright|wall]
right [crate|apple] -> [crate cantright |apple]
up [crate|playerpart] -> [crate cantup| playerpart]
up [crate|wall] -> [crate cantup|wall]
up [crate|apple] -> [crate cantup |apple]
down [crate|playerpart] -> [crate cantdown| playerpart]
down [crate|wall] -> [crate cantdown|wall]
down [crate|apple] -> [crate cantdown |apple]

startloop
left[crate crateleft cant|crate] -> [crate crateleft cant| crate cant]
right[crate crateright cant|crate] -> [crate crateright cant|crate cant]
up[crate crateup cant|crate] -> [crate crateup cant| crate cant]
down[crate cratedown cant|crate] -> [crate cratedown cant| crate cant]



right[crate cantleft|crate] -> [crate cantleft|crate cantleft]
left[crate cantright|crate] -> [crate cantright|crate cantright]
down[crate cantup|crate] -> [crate cantup|crate cantup]
up[crate cantdown|crate] -> [crate cantdown|crate cantdown]

endloop

[left crate cantleft] -> [stationary crate cantleft]
[right crate cantright] -> [stationary crate cantright]
[up crate cantup] -> [stationary crate cantup]
[down crate cantdown] -> [stationary crate cantdown]

startloop

left[moving crate crateleft|crate] -> [moving crate crateleft|moving crate]
right[moving crate crateright|crate] -> [moving crate crateright|moving crate]
up[moving crate crateup|crate] -> [moving crate crateup|moving crate]
down[moving crate cratedown|crate] -> [moving crate cratedown|moving crate]
[moving crate cratebody] -> [moving crate moving cratebody]
[> crate|crate] -> [> crate|> crate]
endloop


[> Player|playerpart] -> [player|playerpart]
[> Player|stationary crate] -> [player|crate] 





startloop
late left [ PlayerBody Leftmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ Leftmarker | PlayerBody ]
late right [ PlayerBody Rightmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ Rightmarker | PlayerBody ]
late up [ PlayerBody Upmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ Upmarker | PlayerBody ]
late down [ PlayerBody Downmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ Downmarker | PlayerBody ]
endloop

late left [ PlayerTail Leftmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ | PlayerTail ]
late right [ PlayerTail Rightmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ | PlayerTail ]
late up [ PlayerTail Upmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ | PlayerTail ]
late down [ PlayerTail Downmarker | No PlayerPart ] -> [ | PlayerTail ]

late [ Crate1 Target ] -> [ Crate2 Target] SFX2
late [ Crate2 No Target ] -> [ Crate1 ] SFX3
late [ Playerpart Target ] -> [ playerpart ghosttarget Target]
late [ ghosttarget No playerpart ] -> [ ]

late [marker player] -> [player]

late [Body] -> []
late down [Downmarker|no PlayerUp] -> [Downmarker PlayerDown|PlayerUp]
late left [Leftmarker|no PlayerRight] -> [Leftmarker PlayerLeft|PlayerRight]
late up [Upmarker|no PlayerDown] -> [Upmarker PlayerUp|PlayerDown]
late right [Rightmarker|no PlayerLeft] -> [Rightmarker PlayerRight|PlayerLeft]

late up [CrateUp|no CrateDown] -> [CrateUp|CrateDown]
late right [CrateRight|no CrateLeft] -> [CrateRight|CrateLeft]


==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============

All Target on Crate
No Apple

=======
LEVELS
=======
